0.1.name: wordpress/openmeetings-integration-plugin-widget
0.1.description:
Openmeetings Wordpress integration widget. OpenMeetings is a free browser-based software that allows you to set up instantly a conference in the Web. You can use your microphone or webcam, share documents on a white board, share your screen or record meetings. It is available as hosted service or you download and install a package on your server with no limitations in usage or users.

Please visit us for more information and updates at:

http://www.eyecatchers.co.il/openmeetings-widget-wordpress-plugin/ Openmeetings hosting at: http://www.linux-hosting.co.il/

Openmeetings has now been released more advanced plugin for Wordpress for a few dollars. I suggest you go grab a copy at: http://code.google.com/p/openmeetings/wik
